/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling city street, bathed in the soft glow of a clear day. The sky above is a serene blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. 

On either side of the street, tall buildings stretch towards the sky, their facades adorned with windows that reflect the world around them. The buildings, painted in shades of white, gray, and brown, stand as silent witnesses to the city's constant motion.

The street itself is a hive of activity. Vehicles of various shapes and sizes navigate their way through the thoroughfare, their colors muted under the bright sunlight. Among them, a white car stands out, parked neatly by the side of the road.

The perspective of the image is particularly striking. Taken from a low angle, it offers a view that looks up at the towering buildings and the expansive sky, lending a sense of grandeur to the everyday hustle and bustle of the city.
